# physicsBody

**Instance Property**

The physics body associated with the node.

## Declaration

```swift
var physicsBody: SCNPhysicsBody? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, specifying that the node does not participate in the physics simulation at all. If you provide a physics body, SceneKit updates the node’s position and orientation each time it processes a step of its physics simulation. For more information on SceneKit’s physics system, see [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsWorld].

## Adding Physics to a Node

- **physicsField**: The physics field associated with the node.
